title: Research & Vet
description: How do we identify these remarkable charitable projects? Our team spends months researching & vetting nonprofits against stringent criteria. We check if their programs are sustainable, if leadership structure & finances are transparent, etc.
stat: Stat:  Since 2016, we have partnered with 17 exceptional organizations through the following areas of outreach: Education, Community Development, Clean Water Initiatives, Healthcare, Food Provision, Poverty Alleviation.

title: Collaborate & Plan
description: We partner with outstanding organizations doing good around the world. Once selected, we discuss how Mite can help support our partner’s projects and follow up with our awesome giving community  to raise funds.
stat: Stat: 100% of our partners reported that they would work with us again.

title: Infield Visit & Document
description: After the completion of our projects we send a small team infield & report back to you on the progress we’ve made. We want you to experience the impact of your gift in as much detail as possible, just as if you were there!
stat: Stat: The Mite team gathers both quantitative and qualitative data on every project we oversee so we may track progress and outcomes to report back to our giving community & managing board.

title: Update & Celebrate
description: This is the most rewarding part of our process. From hours' worth of footage, we create & share breathtaking highlight videos & photos so you can witness the personal impact of your gift. This is our way of showing our gratitude & celebrating what your giving has achieved.
stat: Stat: Our giving community has impacted the lives of over 70,000 people in 20 different countries so far...and this is still growing!
